title: CodeStorm 2025
description: A 24-hour hackathon where innovators build real-world tech solutions.

title: AI & ML Bootcamp
description: Hands-on bootcamp covering AI and Machine Learning basics.

title: Web Development Sprint
description: An intensive 3-day sprint covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive layouts.

title: Open Source Contribution Workshop
description: Learn how to find beginner-friendly repositories, make your first PR, and collaborate on GitHub.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Session
description: An introductory session on common cyber threats, safe practices, and career paths in cybersecurity.

title: UI/UX Design Jam
description: A collaborative design event focused on wireframing, prototyping, and user-centered design.

title: Resume & LinkedIn Optimization Session
description: A career-focused session helping students improve resumes and professional online profiles.

title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
description: Introduction to cloud platforms, deployment models, and basic cloud services.

title: DSA Practice Marathon
description: A problem-solving marathon focusing on arrays, strings, and basic algorithms.
